attributes.action: Make the Royals a full time tourist attraction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Royals could do with a job. What better than if the Prime Minister could put the Royal family in the London dungeon as a full time tourist attraction! Now the whole idea is that tourist who come to London don't get to the see the Royals instead they only get to see their palace. The money created from the Royals being in the dungeon could help fund the NHS or schools and that would be in good service to the Queens good people.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
